techmeme.title: Daniel Ek says Spotify's ad business has "been moving too slowly"; Spotify ad chief Lee Brown left on July 28 to join DoorDash as its chief revenue officer (Catherine Perloff/The Information)
The US SEC approves in-kind creations and redemptions for crypto ETFs, allowing institutional investors to exchange ETF shares for the underlying BTC or ETH (André Beganski/Decrypt)
EA reports Q1 net bookings up 3% YoY to $1.3B, above $1.29B est., and forecasts Q2 net bookings of $1.8B to $1.9B, below estimates of $2.01B (Zaheer Kachwala/Reuters)
Google rolls out new AI Mode features: Search Live with video input, Canvas for planning, image and PDF uploading, and AI Mode in Google Lens in desktop Chrome (Abner Li/9to5Google)
Sources: Groq is set to raise ~$600M in a funding round led by Disruptive, which committed more than $300M to the deal that would give Groq a ~$6B valuation (Lizette Chapman/Bloomberg)
